name: Pillows Of Love VR
description:
We created this demo of Pillows Of Love at the Utah Indie Game Jam. We never worked with Virtual Reality before now and were interested to try it out.

We enjoyed it enough that we are now planning on publishing our project on steam, for the steam vr.

3D Modelers : Benji / Darron

Animator : Darron

Character Designer : Charles

Programmer : Lafsnb (@Lafsnb on twitter)

Testers : Zander / Jerramy / James
